about_the_game:
Golf Around! Lite is a free, fun multiplayer Mini Golf game, for up to 12 players! Can you beat your friends or will your golf ball be roasted to a crisp?




Features:
  • Online multiplayer and single player
  • 4 official golf courses filled with devious traps: Village, Dungeon, Snowy, and Lab
  • POWERUPS, like slime, bombs, and smokescreens
  • Play as a PINEAPPLE or many other shapes
  • Many game modes like racing, jumping, gravity and hardcore mode
  • Swing a club or charge up your shot

    In the Lite version, you can enjoy 4 official maps - Village, Dungeon, Snowy, Lab.
    The "Golf Around!" full version, also available on Steam, includes 11 official maps, 1000s of custom maps, a level editor, achievements, item customization, and much more.
